review: I prefer the roku, the interface is more simplified, but for the price at the initial lightning deal ($20) this is well worth it.
author: Abby Road

review: Bought it strictly for sling tv and i have gone to buy a second. I love it works great easy to navigate.
author: TallJohn

review: We love it so far no complaints.
author: Lisa Gray

review: I USE IT ALL THE TIME. VERY EASY FOR THOSE OF US WHO ARE NOT TECH EXPERTS TO USE
author: LEROY MCGLINCHEY

review: Easy to set up. It performed as it was advertised to do. Great buy. Great tool.
author: Larry G. Ware

review: I think I would have loved it but maybe I got a defect because I could not get it to fit my TV.  I do plan on reordering so Ill see how the next one works.
author: Baltohon1

review: Love the fire stick extremely user friendly  would recommend  to everyone great buy
author: frances clay

review: Awesome product ended up buying one for every tv in the house
author: Bri

review: Love it! Now I can watch TV when I go to bed. There's never anything on TV worth watching, so now I have a choice.
author: C Hertel
